title: See Invisible (spell)
data:
{{obsolete}} ''This article is about the spell. For the character trait, see [[See invisible]].'' {{Spell |name=See Invisible |level=4 |school1={{Charms}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
* [[Book of Enchantments]]
|castingnoise=3 |spellnoise=0 }} {{Flavour|This spell enables the caster to perceive things that are shielded from ordinary sight.}} '''See Invisible''' is a level 4 [[Charms]] spell that grants the caster the [[see invisible]] intrinsic, allowing you to see [[invisible]] enemies (as well as yourself, negating the penalties associated with being unable to see your own body). {{crawlquote|Spell cast: ''Your vision seems to sharpen.''
Spell nearly concluded: ''You begin to squint at shadows.''
Spell concluded: ''Your eyesight blurs momentarily.''}} ==Tips & Tricks== Wearing a [[ring of see invisible]] is usually more convenient, as it takes just about as much time to switch to it and there isn't any chance of a miscast or it wearing off mid-fight. However, if you haven't found a ring yet (or are already wearing two rings that are absolutely vital to your survival), this spell can help against pesky invisible critters like [[unseen horror]]s or [[ghost moth]]s. [[Felid]]s, [[naga]]s, [[spriggan]]s, and [[vampire]]s can see invisible naturally, as can any character with the [[Acute Vision]] [[mutation]]. This spell serves no purpose for these characters. ==History== See Invisible was removed in [[0.12]]. Prior to the removal of the [[Divinations]] spell school in [[0.6]], this spell was an [[Enchantments]]/[[Divinations]] spell. [[Category:Obsolete spells]]
